header.title: Debt: The Monster Before Our Eyes

title: Debt: The Monster Before Our Eyes
content:
It is impossible to exaggerate the seriousness of this horror. Debt is the undoing of the United States. The dreadful process of unraveling and deleveraging can no longer be avoided.
The consequences will be so invasive to people’s lives that they will rue the day when they ignored my plea for people to leave the United States.
Life will become truly intolerable: shortages in every area, soaring crime, steeply rising taxes, curtailment of basic civic services, massively rising unemployment, total shut-down of basic freedoms… all these things are going to happen.
The truth about the misrepresentation of corporate earnings.
The specifics of the decline of the American middle class.
The obsession with sports in American schools.
